Class MatrixMultiplicationApp

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.example.MatrixMultiplicationApp
public class MatrixMultiplicationApp extends javafx.application.Application
An application used for performing various operations on matrices

    • generateInputGrids

      private void generateInputGrids(javafx.scene.layout.VBox inputGrids, javafx.scene.control.Label resultLabel, javafx.scene.control.TextField rows1Field, javafx.scene.control.TextField cols1Field, javafx.scene.control.TextField rows2Field, javafx.scene.control.TextField cols2Field, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> operatorComboBox, javafx.scene.control.Button calculateButton)
      Generates and displays grids that allow the user to input values.
      Parameters:
      inputGrids - A box containing all input grids.
      resultLabel - A label that displays information about the result, including errors.
      rows1Field - The value that was entered for the rows of matrix1.
      cols1Field - The value that was entered for the columns of matrix1.
      rows2Field - The value that was entered for the rows of matrix2.
      cols2Field - The value that was entered for the columns of matrix2.
      operatorComboBox - The ComboBox that is used to select the operation.
      calculateButton - The button that is used to calculate the result.

    • calculateResult

      private void calculateResult(javafx.scene.control.TextField rows1Field, javafx.scene.control.TextField cols1Field, javafx.scene.control.TextField rows2Field, javafx.scene.control.TextField cols2Field, javafx.scene.layout.VBox inputGrids, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> operatorComboBox, javafx.scene.control.Label resultLabel)
      Calculates the result of the specified operation on the input values for matrix1 and matrix2.
      Parameters:
      rows1Field - The value that was entered for the rows of matrix1.
      cols1Field - The value that was entered for the columns of matrix1.
      rows2Field - The value that was entered for the rows of matrix2.
      cols2Field - The value that was entered for the columns of matrix2.
      inputGrids - A box containing all input grids.
      operatorComboBox - The ComboBox that is used to select the operation.
      resultLabel - A label that displays information about the result, including errors.

    • clearValues

      private static void clearValues(javafx.scene.control.TextField rows1Field, javafx.scene.control.TextField cols1Field, javafx.scene.control.TextField rows2Field, javafx.scene.control.TextField cols2Field, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> operatorComboBox, javafx.scene.layout.VBox inputGrids, javafx.scene.control.Label resultLabel, javafx.scene.control.Button calculateButton)
      Clears all the values that have been input.
      Parameters:
      rows1Field - The value that was entered for the rows of matrix1.
      cols1Field - The value that was entered for the columns of matrix1.
      rows2Field - The value that was entered for the rows of matrix2.
      cols2Field - The value that was entered for the columns of matrix2.
      operatorComboBox - The ComboBox that is used to select the operation.
      inputGrids - A box containing all input grids.
      resultLabel - A label that displays information about the result, including errors.
      calculateButton - The button that is used to calculate the result.

    • createMatrixGrid

      private javafx.scene.layout.GridPane createMatrixGrid(int rows, int cols, String title)
      Creates a GridPane object with the specified dimensions. The GridPane will have a TextField in each cell for users to enter values for each index of the matrix.
      Parameters:
      rows - Specifies the number of rows that the resulting GridPane will have.
      cols - Specifies the number of columns that the resulting GridPane will have.
      title - Specifies the title, which is used in the input TextField to show the user which matrix they are inputting values for.
      Returns:
      Returns the created GridPane object.

    • extractMatrixFromGrid

      private int[][] extractMatrixFromGrid(javafx.scene.Node node, int rows, int cols)
      Returns an int[][] containing the values of a GridPane.
      Parameters:
      node - A node that is a GridPane containing the results.
      rows - The number of rows that the GridPane has.
      cols - The number of columns that the GridPane has.
      Returns:
      An int[][] containing the values that have been entered into a GridPane.

    • addMatrices

      public static int[][] addMatrices(int[][] matrix1, int[][] matrix2)
      Returns the result of adding two matrices.
      Parameters:
      matrix1 - The first matrix to be added.
      matrix2 - The second matrix to be added.
      Returns:
      The result of adding matrix1 and matrix2.

      public static int[][] subtractMatrices(int[][] matrix1, int[][] matrix2)
      Returns the result of subtracting matrix2 from matrix1.
      Parameters:
      matrix1 - The matrix to be subtracted from.
      matrix2 - The matrix to be subtracted.
      Returns:
      The result of subtracting matrix2 from matrix1.

      matrix1 - The first matrix to be multiplied.
      matrix2 - The second matrix to be multiplied.
      Returns:
      The result of multiplying matrix1 and matrix2.

    • multiplyMatrixByScalar

      public static int[][] multiplyMatrixByScalar(int[][] matrix, int a)
      Multiplies a matrix by a scalar.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The matrix to be multiplied.
      a - The scalar that the input matrix is to be multiplied by.
      Returns:
      The result of multiplying matrix by a.

    • raiseMatrixToPower

      public static int[][] raiseMatrixToPower(int[][] matrix, int power)
      Raises the input matrix to a scalar power via repeated multiplication.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The matrix that is to be raised to the given power.
      power - The power that the matrix is to be raised to.
      Returns:
      The result of raising the input matrix to the input power.

    • calcDeterminant

      public static int calcDeterminant(int[][] matrix)
      Calculates the determinant of a given matrix.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The matrix to calculate the determinant for.
      Returns:
      An integer containing the determinant.

    • strikeMatrix

      public static int[][] strikeMatrix(int[][] matrix, int row, int column)
      Generates the matrix that is formed by removing the row and column that a given element belongs to. This is used to calculate the determinant of a matrix that is larger than 2x2.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The source matrix.
      row - The row that is being struck from the matrix.
      column - The column that is being struck from the matrix.
      Returns:
      The matrix that is formed by striking the given row and column from the source matrix.

    • transposeMatrix

      public static int[][] transposeMatrix(int[][] matrix)
      Transposes the input matrix such that each element m,n of the result matrix is equal to element n,m of the source matrix.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The matrix to be transposed.
      Returns:
      The result of transposing the source matrix.

    • createResultGrid

      private javafx.scene.layout.GridPane createResultGrid(int[][] matrix)
      Creates a GridPane from an int[][].
      Parameters:
      matrix - The matrix to be converted into a GridPane.
      Returns:
      A GridPane containing the values from the input matrix.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Launches a javaFX window that allows the user to use the matrix calculator.
      Parameters:
      args - The arguments that are passed in from the command line.
